p: However, at age 19, it was not clear which of the athletes were going to be successful in transition to the national team and if a high Hb mass was a possible prerequisite. The aim of this brief report was to analyze how many athletes between ages 16â€“19 were still members of the Swiss national team at age 25, how many terminated their career, and if Hb mass at ages 16 and 19 was different between these two groups.
